entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 20.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h this evening then light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
